If the bundle does NOT meet TRC requirements but DOES meet Specs-based requirements, then it may be quoted for UC on UCS Specs-based only. If the bundle meets TRC requirements, it may be quoted for UC on UCS TRC. Do not assume that every UCS bundle part number on UCS Quick Catalog can be used with UC on UCS.
